explicacion_precios_p1: Prices are updated whenever the market changes. It is important to remember that the prices ARE ONLY A GUIDE. Prices are adjusted according to market fluctuations inside and outside the game.
explicacion_precios_p2: REMEMBER: They are your furnis, you decide how much they are worth.
explicacion_tendencias_p1: That an item in the catalog has or depends on the price variation of the last 16 days.
explicacion_votos_p1:
It is the support that the community gives to the current price of the item. Every time the price is updated, the counter is reset. You can only vote once per IP.
ONCE VOTED, IT IS NOT POSSIBLE TO CHANGE THE VOTE.
consola_title:
Emo.
Hello, I have some news for you :D
dolares: Dollars
alert_voto_precio: You have already voted for or against the price of this item.
alert_voto_tendencia: You have already voted if you think the price will go up or down for this item.
equivalente_text:
The furni "{{itemNameA}}" is worth {{equivalentAtoB}} "{{itemNameB}}"

This is the same as saying that

The furni "{{itemNameB}}" is worth {{equivalentBtoA}} "{{itemNameA}}"
explicacion_master_trades_p1: All catalog prices are debated and approved by the MasterTrades in the image. The price must have 50% approval to be modified. If it gets less, it is not modified.
explicacion_master_trades_p2: REMEMBER: The master trades only try to make a guide with the most accurate prices to reality, however, they are your furnis, you decide how much they are worth.
